Mendokusai

Tartarus

I also won and I will also win again

11 Feb 2020

Imagine thinking that you’d be able to win a last longer bet about blogs when it takes you six commits to even successfully publish one blog post… Or six months to correctly spell your own name.

My favourite thing about poker was always hurting other people’s egos, the money was just a convenient corollary. Everyone knows you can’t just crush the fish or they’ll never play the game again, every so often you’ve got to lose a pot just to keep them on the hook…

Good luck buddy <3
